it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.client

Interface ServerConnection

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Remote, RemoteObserver<ViewEvent>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RMIServerConnection, SocketServerConnection

    public interface ServerConnection
extends RemoteObserver<ViewEvent>
    Describes a connection the client has with the server, regardless of the connection method
    Author:
    Alessandro Fulgini

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addObserver(RemoteObserver<ModelUpdate> observer)
      Adds an observer to listen for updates
      void close()
      Attempts to close the connection with the server.
      void connect(String hostname)
      Connects to the server with provided hostname on the default port
      void connect(String hostname, int port)
      Connects to the server with provided hostname on the provided port
      boolean isActive()
      Determines whether the connection is active or not by pinging the server
      void login(String username)
      Send a login request to the server
      void logout(String username)
      Sends a logout request to the server If the user was not logged in, nothing happens
      void removeObserver(RemoteObserver<ModelUpdate> observer)
      Removes an observer from listening for updates If it hasn't previously subscribed, does nothing

      • Methods inherited from interface it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.common.observer.RemoteObserver

        update

    • Method Detail

      • isActive

        boolean isActive()
        Determines whether the connection is active or not by pinging the server
        Returns:
        true if the connection is active, false otherwise

      • connect

        void connect(String hostname)
      throws IOException
        Connects to the server with provided hostname on the default port
        Parameters:
        hostname - The hostname to connect to
        Throws:
        IOException - if the connection fails

      • connect

        void connect(String hostname,
             int port)
      throws IOException
        Connects to the server with provided hostname on the provided port
        Parameters:
        hostname - The hostname to connect to
        port - The port to connect to
        Throws:
        IOException - if the connection fails

      • close

        void close()
        Attempts to close the connection with the server. If the connection was active, it will be closed, if it was already inactive or closed, nothing will happen. Subsequent calls to isActive() will return false

      • login

        void login(String username)
    throws IOException,
           LoginException
        Send a login request to the server
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the user
        Throws:
        IOException - if the server cannot be reached
        LoginException - if the login fails

      • logout

        void logout(String username)
     throws IOException
        Sends a logout request to the server If the user was not logged in, nothing happens
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the user
        Throws:
        IOException - if the server cannot be reached

      • addObserver

        void addObserver(RemoteObserver<ModelUpdate> observer)
        Adds an observer to listen for updates
        Parameters:
        observer - The object representing the observer, not null

      • removeObserver

        void removeObserver(RemoteObserver<ModelUpdate> observer)
        Removes an observer from listening for updates If it hasn't previously subscribed, does nothing
        Parameters:
        observer - The object representing the observer, not null
